meanings.definition: A small amount of something, especially a drink
meanings.sent1: She poured a tot of whiskey into the glass.
meanings.sent2: The bartender measured out a tot of rum for the cocktail.
meanings.sent3: He added a tot of milk to his coffee, making it creamy.
meanings.sent4: The tot of perfume was just enough to create a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent5: A tot of honey sweetened the tea perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The numbers will tot to fifty when you add them up.
